TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElementEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)並[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md) and [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 發生事件，只有當您呼叫方法。The event occurs only when you call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownElements.xml 檔案。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目，是每當就會發生事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要嘗試的範例，請將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownElements.xml 的檔案。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CPP/unknownelement.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CS/unknownelement.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/VB/unknownelement.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得表示未知 XML 項目的物件。

span.span: The object that represents the unknown XML element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownElements.xml 檔案。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目，是每當就會發生事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要嘗試的範例，請將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownElements.xml 的檔案。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CPP/unknownelement.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CS/unknownelement.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/VB/unknownelement.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得應該在 XML 文件執行個體中之 XML 項目名稱的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: Gets a comma-delimited list of XML element names expected to be in an XML document instance.

value.span: XML 項目名稱的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: A comma-delimited list of XML element names.

value.span: 每個名稱都使用下列格式：:。

span.span: Each name is in the following format: :.

summary.span: 如果 XML 讀取器 (Reader) 是 ，取得遇到未知項目的行號。

span.span: Gets the line number where the unknown element was encountered if the XML reader is an .

value.span: 如果 XML 讀取器是 ，則為遇到未知項目的行號，否則為 -1。

span.span: The line number where the unknown element was encountered if the XML reader is an ; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性為基礎的 XML 讀取器時，才會傳回值。The property returns a value only if the underlying XML reader is an . ## Examples 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownElements.xml 檔案。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目，是每當就會發生事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要嘗試的範例，請將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownElements.xml 的檔案。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` [!code-cpp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CPP/unknownelement.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/CS/unknownelement.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example/VB/unknownelement.vb#1)]

span.span: The number in the line where the unknown element occurs if the XML reader is an ; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownElements.xml 檔案。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownElements.xml. 在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目，是每當就會發生事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要嘗試的範例，請將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownElements.xml 的檔案。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownElements.xml. ``` MyGroup Large 444 West ``` XmlSerializer.UnknownElement 範例 #1XmlSerializer.UnknownElement Example#1
